generalInfo:
A relaxing voyage exploring God’s own country!
Start from the gateway and the heritage town Cochin, then pass through the old British hill station of Munnar, the wilderness at Periyar and go on to the fascinating backwaters enjoying nature and listening to the lullaby of waves and weeds...
Finally have a sun and sand experience at a sea-side village with coconut groves, lily ponds and a large organic farm.
Almost all accommodation properties featured here belong to the CGH Earth group who conceives and organizes truly remarkable travel experiences based on sustainable and responsible tourism. Be excited for a truly authentic experience!

Destinations and routing:
Cochin – Dewalokam – Munnar – Periyar – Kumarakom - Alleppey – Marari

Main Excursions:
- Cochin: Cycle tour and sightseeing
- Munnar: Laxmi Hill track, Tea Museum and tea tasting
- Periyar: Bamboo rafting, Nature track and Kalaripayattu (oldest form of martial art)
- Alleppey: Canoe ride

Includes:
- 16 nights accommodation in a double room as per accommodation plan
- Meals as per the meal plan specified in each property
- Transport services using air-conditioned Innova as per the program from Chennai Airport till drop back at Bangalore Airport
- Services of English speaking local guide for sightseeing at Mahabalipuram, Tanjore, Madurai & Mumbai
- Local assistance for sightseeing at Chidambaram & Chettinad
- Monument entrance fees for sightseeing as applicable at above places
- Rickshaw ride at Pondicherry (Approx. duration: 1 hour)
- Visit of the night ceremony at Madurai
- Cotton Trail program at Pollachi as arranged through the resort
- Toy train fare from Coonoor to Ooty in First / Second Sitting Class (Dep. 10:40 / Arr. 12:00)
- Explore Mysore by walk program with breakfast from a local restaurant
- Farewell gift with our complements
- Arrival / departure assistance at Chennai & Bangalore airports by our representative
- All applicable Government taxes as per present rules

dayInfo.description: ARRIVAL IN COCHIN - FORT COCHIN [By Surface - 45 km/Approx 1.5 hrs] Arrival assistance at Cochin International airport. Transfer to Fort Cochin. Overnight stay at Hotel. Details: Arrival at Cochin by flight. After clearing customs and immigrations you will be met by us once you exit the arrival hall and whisked away to your waiting transport. You will be transferred to the hotel at Mahabalipuram. Kochi (colonial name Cochin) is the green commercial capital of Kerala, a cluster of islands located on the coast of the Arabian sea with one of the finest natural harbours in the world. The harbour is the nucleus around which Cochin and its mainland part Eranakulam has grown to attain such strategic importance over the centuries as underlined by the sobriquet “Queen of the Arabian Sea “. Informally, Cochin is also referred to as the Gateway to Kerala, being the most cosmopolitan and modern city of Kerala where the best shopping, markets and bazaars are located. Check in at hotel and you are at leisure for the rest of the day. Overnight at Cochin.

COCHIN - Breakfast at the Hotel. Sightseeing and Kathakali Show. Overnight at the Hotel. After breakfast proceed for Cochin sightseeing with your chauffeur and Guide. Visit the Dutch Palace at Mattancherry (Friday closed). It is renowned for its wall murals depicting scenes from the Ramayana. The Jewish Synagogue (Friday & Saturday closed) at the heart of what is locally called the Jew Town. The St Francis Church, the oldest European Church in India. The Santa Cruz Basilica, originally built in 1557 by the Portuguese. The Chinese fishing nets are believed to be brought to Kochi by the Chinese Traders. Evening visit to a nearby theatre to witness Kathakali dance. The Kathakali is the famous art form of Kerala with elaborate make-up for the artists, each performance is based on a story. It will be interesting to watch from the time the artist starts the makeup. Overnight at Cochin.

COCHIN - MUNNAR [By Surface: 140 km /Approx. 4 Hrs] Breakfast at the Hotel. Drive to Munnar. Overnight at the Hotel. Details: Breakfast at the hotel. Then drive to Munnar. Munnar is a beautiful hill station on the Western Ghats at about 1600 meter above sea level. There are lakes, reservoirs, forests and several tea estates in Munnar. Famous Tata Tea estate and factory is in Munnar. There is a wildlife sanctuary in the Eravikulam - Rajamala area in the Munnar forest division. Munnar was the summer resort of the British Government in the South. It is the right place to spot Nilgiri Thar (a rare breed of Mountain Goats in the world). Check in at the hotel and you are at leisure for the rest of the day. Overnight at Munnar.

MUNNAR- Breakfast at the Hotel. Munnar Sightseeing. Overnight at the Hotel. Details: Munnar sightseeing with Guide. Visit Eravikulam Wildlife Sanctuary, Mattupety Dam, Echo Point & Tea Museum where you will get the chance to watch the process and also the taste of Munnar Tea. Overnight at Munnar.

MUNNAR - PERIYAR [By Surface: 130 km /Approx. 4.5 Hrs] Breakfast at the Hotel. Drive to Periyar. Overnight at the Hotel. Details: Breakfast at the hotel and then drive to Periyar. Thekkady or Periyar is South India’s most popular wildlife sanctuary, encompassing an area of 777 sq km. Set on the attractive man-made Periyar Lake; it attracts over 300,000 visitors a year. Though the sanctuary was made a part of Project Tiger in 1973, it is better known for its elephants. On arrival check in at the hotel. Overnight at Periyar.

PERIYAR - Breakfast at the Hotel. Spice Plantation Visit and Kalaripayattu Show. Change accommodation into Tree House. Overnight at Hotel. Details: Breakfast at the Hotel. Morning spice plantation Visit with a naturalist. Where one can see the cultivation of a whole range of spices like pepper, cardamom, cloves, turmeric, vanilla, all spice cinnamon etc. Evening visit to a nearby centre to witness Kalaripayattu show ( Martial Art ). Overnight at Periyar.

PERIYAR - Breakfast at Hotel. Boating. Overnight at Hotel. Details: Breakfast at Hotel. In the morning you can explore the spice town with our chauffeur. Afternoon Boat ride in Lake Periyar, and see the wildlife around the lake as you cruise along its banks. Apart from elephants, bison, sambar, wild boar, langur, otter and flying squirrel are common. There are also 246 species of birds and 112 species of butterfly. Overnight at Periyar.

PERIYAR - Breakfast at Hotel. Boating. Overnight at Hotel. Details: Breakfast at Hotel. This day is at leisure to enjoy the facilities offered by the resort or you can avail some other jungle activities. Activity options available here include Jungle Treks, Night Trekking, Hiking, Bamboo Rafting etc. Overnight at Periyar.

PERIYAR – KUMARAKOM [By Surface: 140 km /Approx. 4 Hrs] Breakfast at the Hotel. Drive to KUMARAKOM. Overnight at the Backwater Resort. Details: After breakfast drive to Kumarakom. Kumarakom is an unbelievably beautiful paradise of mangrove forests, emerald green paddy fields and coconut groves interspersed with enchanting waterways and canals adorned with white lilies. Situated on the Vembanad Lake, in this small water world you'll come across plenty of traditional country crafts, boats and canoes which will take you into the heart of the scenic lake. The resort offers comfortable accommodation and exclusive leisure options (on payment basis) like an Ayurvedic massage, yoga, meditation, boat rides, fishing, angling and swimming. Overnight at Kumarakom.

KUMARAKOM - Breakfast at the hotel. At Leisure. Overnight at the Backwater Resort. After breakfast you can avail some activities offered by the resort or be at leisure to enjoy the backwaters. Overnight at KUMARAKOM.

KUMARAKOM –ALLEPPEY - Breakfast at the Resort. Board at Houseboat. Lunch, Dinner & Overnight at Onboard Houseboat. Details: Breakfast at Hotel. By afternoon board your houseboat for a cruise in the backwaters of Kerala and explore the life around this region. Large wooden Cargo boats are converted into Houseboats with overnight staying facilities and became an attraction in the backwaters. The Houseboats are normally equipped with fully furnished Bed rooms with attached bathrooms and Kitchen. Mouthwatering Kerala Dishes are served onboard boat. There are ample opportunities to do nothing, just relaxing embraced by the natural wind. In the evening wait for the romance of seasonal birds displayed in the vast canvas of the reddish sky. Then enjoy the delights of a royal dinner under a million stars. Listen the lullaby of the waves and weeds of the Lake and have a sound sleep. Lunch will be served onboard and the cruise in the backwaters passing through many villages. Overnight onboard Houseboat.

ALLEPPEY - MARARI BEACH [By Surface: 20 km / Approx 45 Minutes.] Breakfast, onboard houseboat. Drive to Marari Beach. Overnight Beach Resort. Details: By 0930 hrs disembark the houseboat at Alleppey after breakfast. You will be met by our chauffeur and drive to Mararikulam. Everyone loves endless golden beaches and they've become something of a tourism clinch, often indistinguishable from one another. But the allure of a beach is not just in the sand and the sea. It's in the living environment that surrounds it. In the trees and plants, the birds and fishes that call it home. And most of all, in the culture, life and color of the people who belong there. Because it is only this that makes it special, different from other interchangeably pretty stretches of sand around the world. Check in at the resort and relax. Day at leisure. Overnight at Marari Beach.

MARARI BEACH - Breakfast at Resort. Day at Leisure. Overnight at hotel. Details: Day at leisure to enjoy the beach and the facilities at the resort or a bicycle ride through the neighboring villages. Also there are yoga sessions daily morning & meditation sessions in the evening for the guests. In addition the resort offers various activities like cooking demonstration, fisherman village visit etc which can be availed on direct payment basis. Overnight at Marari Beach.

MARARI - COCHIN AIRPORT DEPARTURE [By Surface: 85 km/Approx 2.5 Hrs] Breakfast at the hotel. Transfer & Assistance from Hotel to Cochin Airport. Today on time our representative will meet you & transfer you to Cochin airport to connect your flight for your onward journey.
